Synopsis: Saves an XML document to a specified file path.
Description: This function saves an XML document to a specified file path using UTF-8 encoding without BOM.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Save-XML -FilePath "C:\Documents\example.xml" -xml $xmlDocument
Saves the XML document $xmlDocument to the file "example.xml" located in the "C:\Documents" directory.
